item.description:
Are you ready to party yourself into shape? Well... this is exactly what this multi level class is is all about. It’s an exhilarating, effective, easy-to-follow, Latin-inspired, calorie-burning dance class that blends red-hot international music, and contagious steps to form a "fitness-party" that is downright addictive! Classes are $12. * cash or check * credit card * slight fee for usage

 

College Students: We know you're on a tight budget, that's why for a limited time Zumba with Jess is offering discounted classes on Thursday nights for cash strapped college students! Half off on Thursdays. College ID required.

This awesome class will feature Zumba, belly dancing, Bollywood, salsa, merengue, cumbia, reggaetone, and cha cha! Even if you have 2 left feet and/or are new to dance... this class will teach you to move!

group.name: Zumba® with Jess in Union Square

item.name: Zumba Party on Thursdays
